title: Ranked Shielding Update
body: I have a question.  Recently Riot updated it's ranked FAQ guide and I was wondering if it means that the 10 game shielding for tiers and 3 games for divisions is going to be active as of now or in the next patch(the one coming up) ? P.s. where do I post this? Here or in another category?

replies.body: The 10 bans wont be here until the next season,if i helped u its good but if not im an idiot

The ranked shields have been a feature for a few seasons now.  The amount of games you are shielded for depends on being promoted to another division or tier per the [ranked play faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ).  If something like that were to change, I imagine it would be through an announceent and not solely a supmport article update.  Hope that helps!
